name.japanese: マーシャル・D・ティーチ

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Pirates Arrive at Impel Down
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard and his crew arrive at Impel Down aboard a hijacked Marine ship, using the Yami Yami no Mi to breach the prison entrance.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Blackbeard's invasion of the world's most secure prison, adding another layer of chaos to the Impel Down arc and setting up his recruitment of Level 6 prisoners.

keyMoments.title: Revelation of Hijacked Marine Ship
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that Blackbeard murdered an entire Marine crew and hijacked their ship to approach Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Blackbeard's ruthlessness and cunning tactical planning.

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard's Disappearance Reported to Sengoku
keyMoments.description: Fleet Admiral Sengoku learns that Blackbeard has mysteriously disappeared from his expected position as a Warlord.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Blackbeard's betrayal of his Warlord position, showing he will abandon any alliance for his own ambitions.

abilities.description: Blackbeard can create and control darkness, using it to suck down enemies and objects, including people and structures.

reveals.information: Betrays his position as Warlord of the Sea by invading Impel Down

keyMoments.title: Magellan Releases Shiryu
keyMoments.description: Chief Warden Magellan makes the dangerous decision to release Shiryu from his cell to confront the Blackbeard Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Sets in motion Shiryu's eventual betrayal and recruitment into the Blackbeard Pirates, proving to be a catastrophic miscalculation by Magellan.

keyMoments.title: Shiryu's Physical Appearance
keyMoments.description: Shiryu appears on screen for the first time as he is released from his cell and receives his sword.
keyMoments.significance: The first visual introduction of Shiryu, who will become one of the most important members of the Blackbeard Pirates and a major antagonist.

keyMoments.title: Shiryu Murders the Guards
keyMoments.description: Immediately after being freed, Shiryu ruthlessly kills all the guards who released him.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Shiryu's character as completely amoral and violent, showing why he was imprisoned and foreshadowing his betrayal.

occupations: Former Head Jailer of Impel Down

reveals.information: First physical appearance on screen, showing his violent and ruthless nature
Was imprisoned for excessive murderous violence against prisoners

keyMoments.title: Releases Shiryu to Fight Blackbeard
keyMoments.description: Overwhelmed by simultaneous crises, Magellan makes the dangerous decision to release Shiryu from imprisonment.
keyMoments.significance: A critical miscalculation that will lead to Shiryu's betrayal and joining the Blackbeard Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Suppresses Level 2 Riot
keyMoments.description: Magellan reveals he has already suppressed the prisoner riot on Level 2 using his poison powers.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Magellan's overwhelming power and efficiency as Chief Warden.

abilities.description: Can create and control various types of poison to subdue enemies.

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Ace's Final View of the Sky
keyMoments.description: As Ace is escorted to Marineford, he receives his final opportunity to see the sky as a prisoner.
keyMoments.significance: A poignant symbolic moment representing Ace's last glimpse of freedom before his execution. The sky symbolizes freedom that he will soon lose.

keyMoments.title: Learns of Luffy's Rescue Attempt
keyMoments.description: Vice Admiral Onigumo informs Ace that his brother Luffy is rioting in Impel Down to rescue him.
keyMoments.significance: Deepens Ace's emotional conflict between gratitude for Luffy's love and guilt over the danger his brother is facing.

keyMoments.title: Buggy and Mr. 3 Reach Level 2
keyMoments.description: Buggy and Mr. 3 successfully reach Level 2 and begin liberating prisoners to create a riot.
keyMoments.significance: Creates additional chaos that divides Impel Down's defenses, inadvertently helping both Luffy and Blackbeard.

keyMoments.title: Comic Relief Meta Reference
keyMoments.description: Buggy and Mr. 3 have a humorous exchange discussing being comic relief characters.
keyMoments.significance: A rare meta moment where characters acknowledge their narrative role.

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Group Fights on Level 4
keyMoments.description: Luffy and his allies continue fighting guards and obstacles on Level 4 during their escape attempt.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the ongoing struggle to escape Impel Down and reach Ace before his execution.
